text: nenapirali, nistheyu allahanige misalagirali. Allahana horatu itararannu tam'ma posakaragisikondavaru, ‘‘avaru nam'mannu allahanige nikatagolisuvarendu matra navu avarannu pujisutteve’’ ennuttare. Avaru bhinnate taliruva visayagalalli allahane avara naduve tirmana maduvanu. Sullugaranagiruva krtaghnanige allahanu khandita sari dariyannu toruvudilla
